column4: Yesterday I was trying Ubunto installed via Wubi and the power went down. Now I can't boot with it. It just brings the command line terminal instead of login user screen
Yes insstall finished fine and it was working fine till power went down
Boot into Windows and run chkdsk C: /F /R from the command prompt (start->run cmd)
unless, as others have asked, you were in the middle of the install.
